channel.title: Comments on: Bali by bike part two: Ijen

item.title: By: Marcus Rosentrater
item.dc:creator: Marcus Rosentrater
item.description:
I read an article about those sulfur minors on the BBC. That's some tough stuff alright. I feel special to have the inside story from the dude that was there.
I'd like to know how much more frequently you find a beer under your pillow then your average Joe. 100,000:1?
item.content:encoded:
I read an article about those sulfur minors on the BBC. That’s some tough stuff alright. I feel special to have the inside story from the dude that was there.

I’d like to know how much more frequently you find a beer under your pillow then your average Joe. 100,000:1?

item.title: By: GeorgAnna
item.dc:creator: GeorgAnna
item.description: Man I bet there are some nice hot springs out there Willie. Have a beer for me and Andy while you're at it. What are you going to be for Halloween this year?
item.content:encoded: Man I bet there are some nice hot springs out there Willie. Have a beer for me and Andy while you’re at it. What are you going to be for Halloween this year?

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: I do hate to shatter everyones idea of me as a princess. Thanks for reading, blog believer
item.content:encoded: I do hate to shatter everyones idea of me as a princess. Thanks for reading, blog believer

item.title: By: Amy Burke
item.dc:creator: Amy Burke
item.description:
Maybe you should start waiting until you've had one complete conversation with someone before you go giving out your phone number. Then again, if you did, we'd miss all the fun!
Guess you're no princess if you could sleep with a beer bottle under your pillow...
item.content:encoded:
Maybe you should start waiting until you’ve had one complete conversation with someone before you go giving out your phone number. Then again, if you did, we’d miss all the fun!

Guess you’re no princess if you could sleep with a beer bottle under your pillow…
